snippet: Gen. James N. Mattis, the American commander in the Middle East, revealed that his recommendation included 13,600 American troops.
abstract: Gen James N Mattis, American commander in Middle East, recommends that 13,600 United States troops remain in Afghanistan after combat mission ends in 2014; also says that NATO contribution to enduring mission in Afghanistan could equal half of American deployment, for total alliance troop presence of 20,000 under his proposal.
